name: Super Beat First Playable
description:
This is my first game, I'm a solo developer and I started this project a couple of months ago, any feedback would be greatly appreciated. Currently the save system is not working as I would like, but you can still save your coins, since I'm still pretty new at this I'm still trying to figure things out as I go. This is just the first playable and I wanted to see how the combat is working and get some feedback.

There are still some details that need to be fixed, I still need more music to make more levels, bosses and special stages.

Any donation is hugely appreciated and will be used to further improve the game (and maybe buy some food)

 I hope you enjoy.

Controls:

Left Click: Basic Attack / Interact

Right Click: Special Attack / Cancel

Space: Jump

F: Heal

1 & 2: Use Item Slot

Shift: Dash

I will be adding controller support in the future, cuz as of right now its not working how I'd like it.

Credits:

Art and Programming: Simon Araneda

Music by: Matsmusic
